problems.title: Generate Balanced Parentheses
problems.description:
Given an integer N, generate all combinations of N pairs of balanced parentheses using recursion.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print each valid combination on a new line. Combinations can be in any order.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2

Sample Output
(())
()()
(Note: Any order with both strings once is accepted.)
hintsList: You can add '(' while open < n, and ')' while close < open. When length reaches 2*n, print curr.
